title: Spencer Hickman from Death Waltz Records - Episode 65
itunes:title: Spencer Hickman from Death Waltz Records - Episode 65
description:
I spoke with founder/owner of Death Waltz Records (and organizer of Record Store Day in the UK), Spencer Hickman, one fine afternoon in LA about our collective passion for vinyl, working at an independent record store and growing a small business. Brought to you in conjunction with Propertyofzack.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
